title: Spicy Garlic Shrimp Linguine
description: This Spicy Garlic Shrimp Linguine is a quick and easy pasta dish that's perfect for weeknight dinners. The spicy garlic shrimp pairs perfectly with the linguine and creates a flavorful and satisfying meal.

instructions.step: Cook the linguine according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
While the pasta is cooking, heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and red pepper flakes and cook for 1 minute.
Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook until pink and opaque, about 2-3 minutes per side.
Remove the shrimp from the skillet and set aside.
Add the white wine to the skillet and bring to a simmer. Cook until the wine has reduced by half, about 2-3 minutes.
Return the shrimp to the skillet and season with salt and pepper, to taste. Add the cooked linguine and toss to combine.
Sprinkle with fresh parsley and grated Parmesan cheese, to taste. Serve immediately.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: This classic Italian dish is quick, easy, and oh so delicious! Creamy eggs, salty bacon, and parmesan cheese create a perfect sauce for al dente spaghetti.

instructions.step: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the spaghetti and cook until al dente.
While the spaghetti is cooking, cook the bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until crispy. Remove the bacon with a slotted spoon and set aside.
Add the minced garlic to the bacon grease and cook for 1-2 minutes, until fragrant.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs and parmesan cheese.
When the spaghetti is done cooking, reserve 1 cup of the pasta water and drain the rest. Return the spaghetti to the pot and place it back over low heat.
Add the cooked bacon and garlic to the spaghetti and toss to combine.
Remove the pot from the heat and add the egg mixture, stirring quickly to coat the spaghetti. If the sauce is too thick, add a little bit of the reserved pasta water to thin it out.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste. Serve immediately, garnished with extra parmesan cheese and black pepper.

comments.comment: This was amazing, so easy to make!

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with bacon, eggs, and Parmesan cheese.

instructions.step: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
Meanwhile, cook the bacon in a pan until crispy.
In a bowl, beat together the eggs, Parmesan cheese, salt, and black pepper.
Drain the cooked spaghetti and add it to the pan with the bacon. Mix well.
Pour the egg mixture over the spaghetti and bacon. Stir continuously until the eggs are cooked and the sauce has thickened.

title: Decadent Chocolate Cake
description: A rich and indulgent chocolate cake that's perfect for any occasion.

instructions.step: Preheat oven to 350°F (180°C). Grease and flour two 9-inch (23cm) round baking pans.
In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
Add eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla extract. Beat with an electric mixer on medium speed for 2 minutes.
Stir in boiling water. The batter will be thin but don't worry!
Pour the batter evenly into the prepared pans.
Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Cool the cakes in the pans for 10 minutes. Then remove them from the pans and cool completely on a wire rack.

title: Strawberry Cheesecake
description: Creamy and delicious cheesecake topped with fresh strawberries.

instructions.step: Preheat oven to 325°F (165°C).
In a food processor, pulse graham crackers into fine crumbs. Add melted butter and pulse until combined.
Press the mixture into the bottom of a 9-inch (23cm) springform pan.
In a large mixing bowl, beat cream cheese until smooth. Add sugar, sour cream, and vanilla extract. Beat until well combined.
Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.
Pour the mixture over the crust in the prepared pan.
Bake for 45-50 minutes, or until the edges are set and the center is slightly jiggly.
Remove from oven and let cool completely. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours or overnight.
When ready to serve, slice strawberries and arrange them on top of the cheesecake. Sprinkle with powdered sugar.

title: Mojito
description: A refreshing cocktail made with rum, lime, mint, and soda water.

instructions.step: Cut the lime into wedges and add them to a tall glass along with the mint leaves and sugar. Use a muddler or the back of a spoon to crush the mint and lime together, releasing their juices and oils.
Fill the glass with ice, then pour in the rum and club soda. Stir well to combine.
Garnish with additional mint leaves and a lime wedge. Serve immediately.

title: Margarita Cocktail
description: A classic, refreshing cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and orange liqueur.

ingredients.name: Orange liqueur (such as Triple Sec or Cointreau)

instructions.step: Rub the rim of a rocks glass with a lime wedge, and dip it in salt to coat the rim.
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice, then add the tequila, lime juice, and orange liqueur.
Shake vigorously for about 15 seconds, then strain the cocktail into the salt-rimmed glass over fresh ice.
Garnish with a lime wedge and serve immediately.

title: Classic Vanilla Milkshake
description: A classic milkshake made with vanilla ice cream and whole milk.

instructions.step: Add the vanilla ice cream and whole milk to a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour into a glass.
Top with whipped cream and a maraschino cherry, if desired.

title: Banana Oat Protein Shake
description: A delicious and healthy protein shake that's perfect for post-workout recovery or as a quick breakfast.

instructions.step: Add all the ingredients into a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour into a glass and enjoy!

title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Protein Smoothie
description: A delicious and healthy smoothie packed with protein, chocolate, and peanut butter!

instructions.step: Add all ingredients to a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour into a glass and enjoy!

title: Vegan Berry Cocktail
description: A delicious and refreshing vegan cocktail made with fresh berries.

instructions.step: Add the frozen berries, banana, orange juice, almond milk, protein powder, and ice to a blender.
Blend until smooth and creamy.
Pour into a glass and enjoy!

title: Honey Cake
description: A deliciously moist and fluffy cake, infused with the rich flavor of honey.

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C). Grease a 9-inch (23cm) cake pan and set aside.
In a large mixing bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt.
In another mixing bowl, beat the eggs until light and frothy. Add in the vegetable oil, honey, granulated sugar, and vanilla extract. Mix well.
Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients and mix until well combined.
Stir in the hot water and mix well. The batter will be thin.
Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan and bake for 40-45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean.
Remove the cake from the oven and let it cool in the pan for 10 minutes. Then, remove the cake from the pan and let it cool completely on a wire rack.

title: Classic Lasagna
description: A classic lasagna recipe that everyone will love!

instructions.step: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add lasagna noodles and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente. Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, cook ground beef over medium heat until browned. Add garlic and onion and cook for an additional 2 to 3 minutes or until onion is tender. Drain fat.
Stir in tomato sauce, canned diced tomatoes, Italian seasoning, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer for 10 minutes.
In a medium bowl, combine ricotta cheese and egg.

Spread 1/2 cup of meat sauce in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish. Arrange 4 lasagna noodles over meat sauce. Spread with one-third of the ricotta cheese mixture. Top with one-third of the mozzarella cheese. Spoon one-third of the meat sauce over the cheese. Repeat layers twice.

instructions.title: Vegetable Lasagna
instructions.description: A delicious and healthy lasagna recipe made with fresh vegetables and creamy béchamel sauce.

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.
In a large skillet over medium-high heat, heat olive oil. Add garlic and onion and cook until onion is translucent, about 5 minutes.
Add zucchini, eggplant, red and yellow bell peppers to the skillet and cook until vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes.
Add spinach to the skillet and cook until wilted, about 2 minutes.
In a separate bowl, mix together ricotta cheese, parmesan cheese, and salt and black pepper to taste.
